text:
Course Hero, located in the San Francisco Bay Area (Redwood City, CA), is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer, ONSITE

Course Hero is looking for a software engineer, focused on building iOS and mobile applications to help build out the next generation of our iOS apps!

You’ll focus on iOS and will have the opportunity to touch all parts of the stack.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it: * Architecting and developing key features or new applications for our mobile platform, focused on iOS. You’ll also establish best practices for mobile software development. * Taking us global as we scale our mobile distribution to millions of students who can access our resources for any course, anywhere, at any time. * Building up TDD and SCRUM practices as part of a small, collaborative team. * Occasionally writing and deploying code for critical projects in our web stack, which includes Symfony + PHP, AngularJS, jQuery, and MySQL.

What we can offer you: * Industry competitive salary and stock options. * Full medical coverage (medical, dental, vision). * 401(k) program to help you save for the future. * Regularly planned team events and outings. * Free Friday lunches and an endless snack and drink supply. * On-site amenities including a day spa, full-service cafeteria, 3 miles of nature walks along the Bay and free membership to a 7500 sq. ft. fitness center. More information at: http://www.thesourcery.com/jobs/879
